name: The Epic of Izdubar
description:
Controls:

Z - Attack and Start Game

X - Switch Weapons (Axes and Knives require ammo pickups)

Left/Right/Up - Move/Jump

Art: https://kitisplode.itch.io/
Music: https://itch.io/profile/surreal-vgm
Code: https://yorikv.itch.io/

Note: there isn't a built-in way to close the game when you're done. You'll need to use ALT + F4 or CMD + Q to close it!
